product_name: One Way Diamond 630 AV Cork Cross-Country Poles - Pair
long_description: OneWay Diamond 630 AV Cork cross-country ski poles are great for leisurely days on groomed trails. 70% fiberglass/30% carbon shafts are light and stiff for good thrust. Cork grips absorb sweat and stay warmer to the touch than plastic grips. Straps wrap around the hands for good pole control. OneWay Diamond 630 AV Cork cross-country ski poles include touring baskets.
short_description: OneWay Diamond 630 AV Cork cross-country ski poles are great for leisurely days on groomed trails.
